translation.en: [man 1] Uh, this is Rattlesnake. Hostiles in the area.
translation.ja: こちらラトルスネーク 敵を確認
戦場で暗躍するのは ヴィクトル･コバル 了解 戦場で暗躍するのは ヴィクトル･コバル
コバルの勢力増大に抗うべく 行くぞ コバルの勢力増大に抗うべく

translation.en: [man 3] Jesus! IED blast ahead! Gumps down! We cannot move forward!
translation.ja: マズい　爆弾攻撃だ 前に進めない

translation.en: -[man 4] Sarge, it's a fuckin' ambush! -[man 3] Fuck, they're everywhere!
translation.ja: 曹長 敵の急襲です 敵だらけだ

translation.en: [man 1] Contact! Contact! West side checkpoint! Man down! Over!
translation.ja: 西の検問で接敵　負傷者発生

translation.en: -[man 6] Fuck! They took out the APC. -[man 7] Sarge, we need to fall back.
translation.ja: 装甲車が破壊された 退却を
ビッグフット どこだ

translation.en: [Bigfoot] I'm on my way. Are we pushing through?
translation.ja: 移動中です　突破は？

translation.en: I think we lost the entire Gump unit, and we have a man trapped. Over!
translation.ja: ガンプ隊は全滅 兵士１名が立ち往生

translation.en: [man 8] Can't see shit! Where the fuck are the Gumps?
translation.ja: クソッ 見えねえよ

translation.en: Gomez! Get your ass over here.
translation.ja: ゴメス こっちへ来い

translation.en: -Where the fuck are they shooting from? -They're fuckin' everywhere.
translation.ja: 狙撃手は？ あちこちに

translation.en: -Where the fuck are the Gumps? -[man 9] I've got you!
We need to get him out of there. See a way through?
[Bigfoot] Sarge, we can't get to him! It's too far.
translation.ja: 曹長 救助は無理です

translation.en: [Sgt.] I repeat, I'm not leaving anyone behind.
translation.ja: いいか　全員で戻るんだ
ビッグフット 行け

translation.en: [Bigfoot] Rattlesnake, come on. I need cover. I'm hit!
translation.ja: 援護が要ります 撃たれた

translation.en: [Sgt.] This is Rattlesnake. I hear you loud and clear.
translation.ja: こちらラトルスネーク すぐに行く

translation.en: -We'll be there. Stay where you are. -Rattlesnake,
translation.ja: こちらラトルスネーク すぐに行く ラトルスネーク こちらローリングサンダー
ラトルスネーク こちらローリングサンダー

translation.en: Unidentified vehicle approaching at high speed.
translation.ja: 正体不明の車両が 全速力で接近中

translation.en: Potential attack. Requesting permission to engage.
translation.ja: 正体不明の車両が 全速力で接近中 攻撃許可を

translation.en: Hold on. I got you, buddy. Come on.
Permission denied. Two of our men trapped.
We have an additional 38 men on the ground.
They're a priority. I need you to fall back. Over.
translation.ja: 彼らを優先し退却せよ

translation.en: Let me get my men out!
Bale, confirm Hellfire with Captain Brydon.
translation.ja: ベイル 攻撃許可を取れ

translation.en: Yes, sir.Base, this is Rolling Thunder, requesting permission for air strike. Over.
translation.ja: こちらローリングサンダー 空爆の許可を

translation.en: Rattlesnake, I need that cover! Do you copy?
translation.ja: ラトルスネーク 援護を

translation.en: Stay there, hold position. We'll come get you.
Rattlesnake, I need you to fall back, over.
translation.ja: ラトルスネーク 退却だ

translation.en: [Sgt.] I repeat! Two of our men trapped! Over!
this is Rolling Thunder. Do I have permission to engage?
I have a heavily armored truck, broad wheelbase.

translation.ja: 発射装置かと そのまま待機せよ

translation.en: this is Amber Base, hold for command.
Truck's too close to our men to risk Hellfire.
Rattlesnake, do you copy? I'm getting fucking hit down here!
translation.ja: 聞こえますか　被弾中だ

translation.en: [Sgt.] All right, Fire team, prepare for cover fire.
translation.ja: 狙撃班は援護射撃の用意を

translation.en: That's a launch-- That's a launcher, sir. Over.
translation.ja: ミサイル発射装置です

translation.en: No launcher visible in my feed.
-Fire request denied. -I'm positive that's a launcher, sir.
translation.ja: 却下する 間違いない

translation.en: You heard him! Hold fire till I clear my men!
We have 38 men on ground, plus two exposed. They'll all die.
[Bigfoot] Rattlesnake, do you copy? -I'm getting fucking hit here! -[Bale] Harp?
translation.ja: 聞こえますか　被弾中だ

translation.en: [Sgt.] We'll be there! Stay where you are!
DA1 off the rail on three…
And one US Army Gump destroyed.
translation.ja: ガンプ隊１隊が全滅 ガンプ隊１隊が全滅 〝空軍 人事記録 トーマス･ハープ〞

translation.en: I made the call that felt most correct given the intel available--
With all due respect, Captain, with 40 men on the ground, I saved 38,
translation.ja: お言葉ですが 40名中38名を救った

translation.en: including Master Sergeant Miller and his convoy.
translation.ja: ミラー特務曹長と部下も

translation.en: If Miller had been given the chance, he would've tried to save all 40.
translation.ja: 曹長なら40人全員を救えた

translation.en: But you took that option away from him.
When did you do your basic?
Have you ever experienced a mass-casualty encounter, other than from behind your screen?
translation.ja: 大量の死傷者が出た現場を 経験したことは？

translation.en: Have you spent time in a conflict zone, Harp?

translation.ja: ありませんが… ご苦労様 中尉

translation.en: Captain, this can't be the only option.
translation.ja: 大尉 他に選択肢は？
軍法会議よりマシだろう

translation.en: -I fought for you. -What am I gonna tell Olivia?
translation.ja: 軍法会議よりマシだろう 婚約者には？

translation.en: Tell her you're going on an all-expenses-paid refresher in how to make the world a safer place.
translation.ja: 世界平和のために 再教育を受けると言え
期間は？ 審査の合格まで

translation.en: I like you, Harp. You're precise, efficient. Brilliant drone pilot.
translation.ja: 君は優秀なドローン操縦士だ

translation.en: But you disobeyed a direct order.
Your CO at Camp Nathaniel is a Captain Leo. Report to him.
translation.ja: ナサニエル駐屯地の リオ大尉が指導官だ

translation.en: Camp Nathaniel? That's where the platoon's based.
translation.ja: ナサニエル？　小隊の基地だ

translation.en: Keep your head down. See it as an opportunity to meet your fellow servicemen.
translation.ja: 謙虚な態度で同僚と交われよ

translation.en: Let's pray you're a fast learner.
-[buzzer] -[man 1] Let's go, guys. Let's get moving!
Move it, soldier. This is your new home, maggots.
translation.ja: ここがお前たちの新しい家だ

translation.en: Get into three separate lines to get scanned in.

translation.ja: 急げ　とっとと動け

translation.en: Welcome to Camp Nathaniel. You'll be seeing a lot of my pretty face.
translation.ja: ようこそ　楽しい学び舎へ

translation.en: Get scanned in by the Gumps and keep it moving.
translation.ja: まずはガンプ隊の検査だ

translation.en: Your digs are in Sections 2 and 4, ahead on your left. Keep it moving, soldier.
translation.ja: 宿舎はこの先の２区と４区

translation.en: Let's go. What are you waiting for?
-[beeping] -Look at them straight in the eye. -Do not hesitate. -[Gump beeps]
translation.ja: メカ兵の目をまっすぐ見ろ

translation.en: [man 1] They smell fear, boys. Keep it moving, soldiers. Come on!
translation.ja: 怯えずに進むんだ さあ 動け

translation.en: Hey, eyes on the prize, soldier. Eyes on the prize. Come on.
translation.ja: 目をそらすな　まっすぐ行け

translation.en: Left foot, right foot, keep it going. Why are you being so slow? Come on!
translation.ja: 左足 右足　その調子だ ぐずぐずするな

translation.en: Excuse me. Hi, I'm looking for Captain Leo.
Oh man. I don't know. You better talk to Colonel Eckhart.
translation.ja: 知らないな エックハート大佐に 聞くといい

translation.en: -He's by the medical tent right there. -Thank you.
translation.ja: エックハート大佐に 聞くといい どうも

translation.en: [man 1] Hey! I am not gonna let my men bleed out on this stretcher here. Move!
translation.ja: ぐずぐずするな　早くしろ

translation.en: Posted here from Creech Air Force Base. Looking for Captain Leo.
translation.ja: リオ大尉を探しています

translation.en: [laughs] You must've really fucked up if they sent you to Leo.
translation.ja: 君は相当な問題児らしい

translation.en: You don't have permission to speak until I ask you a question.
translation.ja: 質問されるまで話すな

translation.en: You even know why you're here?

translation.ja: エクスペリエンタム･ オクトリアットです ラテン語を使わずに説明しろ

translation.en: Don't give it a Latin name, shit. Explain it to me.
translation.ja: ラテン語を使わずに説明しろ

translation.en: Uh, it's an Ethics Committee dictate, sir.
It proposes UAV pilots would exercise greater caution if they experienced--
translation.ja: 無人航空機(ＵＡＶ)操縦士として…

translation.en: The Ethics Committee is a PR team.
This dictate is a bullshit pass for pilots who fuck up.
translation.ja: しくじった操縦士に 逃げ道を与えた

translation.en: You killed two marines. You should be in jail.
translation.ja: 本来なら収監されるべきだ

translation.en: Someone deemed the dollar value of your training to be higher than the lives of those two men.
translation.ja: だが２名の命より 再訓練が優先された

translation.en: If you survive, Air Force keeps a pilot.
translation.ja: 耐え抜けば復職できる

translation.en: You don't, you're a cautionary tale to all the other fly-by-wire assholes.
translation.ja: 逃げ出せば悪例として 語り継がれる

translation.en: -With all due respect, sir-- -I didn't ask you a question, son.
translation.ja: ですが… 質問はしていない
13区画だ　音楽を頼りに行け

translation.en: [female announcer] Remaining charging time for Gump unit C-45, 20 minutes.
translation.ja: Ｃ45ガンプ隊 充電時間残り20分

translation.en: Engaged to Olivia Rose Meyer of Carlsbad.
translation.ja: オリビア･ローズ･ マイヤーズと婚約中

translation.en: To be married in Palm Springs.
translation.ja: 挙式はパームスプリングス

translation.en: It's a very nice part of the world.
Did I leave anything out other than your kills and commendations
translation.ja: あとは撃墜記録と褒賞記録

translation.en: or the fact that you can't appreciate culture,
or you just don't know when to shut the fuck up?
translation.ja: 余計な口を利いてばかり

translation.en: How many insurgents have you killed, Harp?
My numbers are consistent with mission goals and flight hours, sir.
translation.ja: 数は任務と航空時間に 一致します

translation.en: Far too many names to memorize and recite, sir.
translation.ja: 多すぎて名前は覚えられない

translation.en: If you could, would you really want to?
I'm aware we kill people, Captain.
If you were aware of that, you wouldn't be here.
translation.ja: あれば ここに来てない

translation.en: If I were… would you be disappointed?
translation.ja: 俺が補給係なら失望するか？

translation.en: -Why would I be disappointed? -'Cause that means you flew 10,000 miles
translation.ja: 失望なんて 遠くから来て 備品の補給はイヤか

translation.en: to sign equipment out of a warehouse.
translation.ja: 遠くから来て 備品の補給はイヤか

translation.en: The fuck do you think you are?
Daddy pay your way through cadet school so you could mind your Ps and Qs?
translation.ja: パパのカネで行儀を習いに？

translation.en: With all due respect, I put myself through cadet school.
translation.ja: お言葉ですが 士官学校へは自分の意志で

translation.en: We have to deliver these vaccines to a clinic.
translation.ja: ワクチンを病院へ運ぶ

translation.en: There's an outbreak of cholera, and it's spreading fast.
translation.ja: コレラの感染が広がっている

translation.en: It might be a war zone, but women and children still get sick.
translation.ja: 患者は女性や子どもだ

translation.en: Yes. I'm hearts and minds. Ostensibly. [chuckles lightly]
translation.ja: それが任務だ　表向きはな

translation.en: So, what do you really do?
I locate and remove advanced weapons from insurgents beyond the wire.
translation.ja: 武装組織が有する 高性能な兵器を排除する

translation.en: And what do you do? Put them in filing cabinets?
It's the latest in counter-intel technology.
Beats the hell out of those Russian hackers.
translation.ja: ロシア人ハッカーに勝つ

translation.en: -You can sign it or read all 90 pages. -Oh. No, sir.
translation.ja: 全部 読むか？ いいえ

translation.en: You ever heard the name Viktor Koval?
translation.ja: ヴィクトル･コバルの名を？

translation.en: Yeah. Heard insurgents say it on intercepted radio comms.
translation.ja: はい 通信傍受の際に聞きました

translation.en: Forget what you heard in the air. You're on the ground now, kid.
translation.ja: 忘れろ　君は地上に降りた

translation.en: Viktor Koval is a Krasny warlord.
translation.ja: コバルはクラズニーの首領

translation.en: The Krasny wanna make the Ukraine a part of Russia.
translation.ja: 狙いはロシアの ウクライナ併合だ

translation.en: -[Harp] Like in the good old days. -Opposing them
translation.ja: 昔に戻る 抵抗する組織も存在する
抵抗する組織も存在する

translation.en: They're a militia set up to defend the independence of the Ukraine.
translation.ja: 独立を守るため 結成された市民軍だ

translation.en: But the Krasnys are getting stronger with the full support of Moscow.
translation.ja: だがクラズニーは ロシアの支援で勢力増大

translation.en: It's a war that's got too hot for the UN,
translation.ja: 国連の手に負えなくなり

translation.en: so now we're the assholes in the middle of it,
translation.ja: 国連の手に負えなくなり 我々が非武装地帯に 派遣された
我々が非武装地帯に 派遣された

translation.en: We're the only thing stopping these guys from committing genocide.
translation.ja: 我々だけが虐殺を阻止できる

translation.en: You believe that, I have a timeshare in Florida I want to sell you.
No, we're talking about Viktor Koval, the Terror of the Balkans.
translation.ja: ヴィクトル･コバルは “バルカンの恐怖”だ

translation.en: There's Intel that says Koval is responsible for the dirty bomb set off in Kiev,
translation.ja: キエフの“汚い爆弾”事件は 奴の仕業らしい

translation.en: This motherfucker may be responsible for 25,000 people's deaths.
My sources tell me he's trying to get to Systema Perimeter.
translation.ja: システマ･ぺリメーターも 狙ってる

translation.en: Systema Perimeter? That's Russia's automated nuclear retaliation system.
translation.ja: それってソ連の 自動核報復装置ですよね
ウクライナは独立後も

translation.en: the country still held one-third of Russia's nuclear arsenal.
translation.ja: ソ連の核兵器の ３分の１を保有

translation.en: Silos scattered across the country at top-secret locations,
translation.ja: 発射装置は国内に 秘密裏に点在し

translation.en: ready to strike anywhere in the world.
But it was shut down like 50 years ago, after the Cold War.
translation.ja: でも50年前 冷戦後に停止したはず

translation.en: You really think Russia would dismantle its one true safeguard against attack?
translation.ja: 強力な防衛手段を 放棄すると思うか？

translation.en: You telling me the Russian systems are still functioning?
translation.ja: つまり まだ機能してる？

translation.en: he's trying to get to the nukes here in Ukraine?
CIA sources say that the Kremlin's lost control of Koval.
translation.ja: ロシア政府の抑えも利かない

translation.en: My informant believes Koval's gonna make a move for those nukes in the next 24 hours.
translation.ja: 情報提供者によれば 24時間以内に奴は動く

translation.en: And if all this is true, imagine what he'll do if he gets his hands on those silos.
translation.ja: その情報が事実なら 何が起こるかは明白だ
イカれたテロリストに核だ

translation.en: Downtown Washington, New York, Paris. Who knows?
translation.ja: ワシントン ニューヨーク パリ 予測不能だ

translation.en: What I do know is, there won't be a pretty little wedding in Palm Springs,
translation.ja: パームスプリングスで 挙式するなら

translation.en: unless you're wearing factor 500 UV protection.
Now, we deliver these vaccines to the hospital,
translation.ja: ワクチンを病院に運び

translation.en: and my informant will feed us intel on Koval's next plan.
translation.ja: 情報提供者から話を聞く
ちょっと大尉　あの…

translation.en: With all due respect, sir, I think there's been a mistake. I just got here.
translation.ja: お言葉ですが 手違いがあるようです

translation.en: [Harp] No, I don't mean it like that, sir.
You wear your uniform, you'll be a standing target.
-Thought I'd be guarding the fence, sir. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 私は基地の警備役かと

translation.en: I don't have any specialist training as a field agent.
translation.ja: 野外訓練は受けていません

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm special enough for both of us.
translation.ja: 心配ない　俺が２人分働く
君の指揮官 第４世代バイオテクだ

translation.en: and I'm gonna give you 60 seconds to deal with it.
I'm-- I'm sorry, what, Captain? [clears throat]
Do you feel as though you can trust me, Harp?
-I, uh-- -[Leo] We're about to enter a war zone.
If I continue to instill shock and distrust,
translation.ja: 俺への不信感が募るなら

translation.en: I'll file your removal papers myself,
and you'll have to deal with the consequences.
translation.ja: その後は自分で対処しろ

translation.en: So, what are you? Like, AI?
Your cell phone's AI. A Gump's AI.
I'm a prototype. My existence is classified.
translation.ja: 俺は試作品で機密扱いだ

translation.en: [Leo] Ask the right question, I'll give you the right answer.
translation.ja: 正しい質問なら答える

translation.en: Okay. What the hell are you?
You want my model number or tech specs? Both are classified.
translation.ja: 俺の型番もスペックも 機密扱いだ

translation.en: Some asshole in Arlington thinks a vending machine can do a soldier's job.
translation.ja: 自販機にも兵士の仕事を

translation.en: -Aside from that, it's got a fucked rotor. -[Gump beeps]
You want me to take the butt of my gun and bash your ugly fucking mug in?
translation.ja: 俺の銃で顔を殴られたいか？

translation.en: Only two people have clearance to know who and what I am. Colonel Eckhart and you.
translation.ja: 俺の正体を知るのは エックハート大佐と君だけだ

translation.en: Why was I assigned to you? I'm not qualified to go chasing nukes.
translation.ja: なぜ私が配属に？ そんな資質はない

translation.en: You weren't assigned. I chose you.
translation.ja: 俺の権限で君を選んだ

translation.en: I can't do this alone. I need eyes on my back.
I needed someone who could think outside the box.
translation.ja: 枠から外れるような者が

translation.en: You respect me like the rest of your commanding officers.
Don't question my authority, and we'll get on fine.
translation.ja: 俺の権威を軽んじるな

translation.en: You recognize my voice, you son of a bitch?
Nothing I say will bring them back.
[man] Report of hostile activities in Sector 9.
translation.ja: 第９区域で敵対行為あり

translation.en: We don't control any of the area outside the wire.
translation.ja: 基地の外はどこも制御不能だ
海兵隊では… “ムチ打ちの刑”

translation.en: Because attacks in it are so frequent.
translation.ja: 絶え間なく攻撃される

translation.en: We are proceeding outside the wire.
translation.ja: これから基地の外に出る

translation.en: If they attack, you're gonna need to shoot back.
translation.ja: 撃たれたら撃ち返せよ

translation.en: Fight a war, never have to leave home.
translation.ja: 自陣から出ずに戦うのは

translation.en: When was the last time you saw her?

translation.ja: 誰と？ とぼけるな　オリビアだ
とぼけるな　オリビアだ

translation.en: -You fucking somebody else? -Get the fuck outta here.
translation.ja: 浮気してるな まさか

translation.en: Come on. Look, I get a sense of arrogance from you.
translation.ja: 君からは傲慢さを感じる

translation.en: Guys like you, so dispassionate, so cold, so into himself.
translation.ja: 感情に流されず冷淡で 内向的な奴は

translation.en: -Those are the guys that usually wander. -Yeah? Well, I'm faithful.
translation.ja: 移り気だからな 俺は一途です
相手も？ ええ 彼女は…

translation.en: [scoffs] Why am I even having this conversation?
I need your head out here, not thinking about if Olivia's at home
translation.ja: 余計な想像はするな オリビアがピラティス講師を 誘う姿とかな

translation.en: playing "put the beef in my taco" with her Pilates instructor.
translation.ja: オリビアがピラティス講師を 誘う姿とかな

translation.en: -Her Pilates instructor's a woman. -Oh, even better!
-She goes both ways. I knew I liked her. -We're getting married in September.
translation.ja: 両刀遣いか　気に入った ９月に挙式です

translation.en: What do you know about relationships? Aren't you like three years old?
You got a picture of her?
Come on, man. Pull it out.
Holy shit. She's a hottie. Congratulations.
translation.ja: いい女だな　おめでとう

translation.en: "My Gummy Bear." [chuckles] She calls you Gummy Bear?
translation.ja: “私のクマグミ” あだ名か？

translation.en: -[radio beeps] -[Miller] This is Rattlesnake. We've been moved up to Yellow alert.
translation.ja: こちらラトルスネーク 警戒態勢に入る

translation.en: [Leo] Look at these poor bastards. Stuck between us and Koval.
translation.ja: 我々とコバルの間で 苦しむ人々だ

translation.en: [man] I got a bunch of civilians. Nine o'clock.

translation.ja: こちらラトルスネーク

translation.en: We have reports from base of aid truck hit. Man down.
translation.ja: トラックが被弾し負傷者発生
繰り返す　トラックが被弾
市民軍による襲撃の疑い

translation.en: [Miller] Proceed with caution. Execute to follow. Over.
translation.ja: 警戒して進め　以上

translation.en: All units prepare to exit the vehicle. Hostiles in the area.
translation.ja: 全隊 降車の用意を 敵の支配地域だ　用心しろ
敵の支配地域だ　用心しろ

translation.en: Listen, put the Gumps out. Form a perimeter in front of the convoy.
translation.ja: ガンプ隊を車両の前に配置

translation.en: -Get ready, kid. -All units on the ground.
translation.ja: 行くぞ 全隊 防御態勢に入れ
全隊 防御態勢に入れ

translation.en: [Miller] Let's keep it calm. Let's keep it clean.
-All Marines, defense formation. -What the fuck's going on?

translation.ja: 落ち着け　早まるな

translation.en: Goddamn Gumps pre-empted. Charlie Nine, hold fire!
translation.ja: ガンプです チャーリーナイン 撃つな

translation.en: Captain, just a sec, sir. Sir?
translation.ja: 大尉 待ってください

translation.en: [marine] Stand down! Put your weapons down.
translation.ja: 下がれ 武器を置け

translation.en: -[Miller] Put 'em down! -Tell your men to put their guns down.
translation.ja: 銃を下げるよう命令を

translation.en: Goddammit! Tell your men to lower their weapons now!
translation.ja: 銃を置けと言っただろ
大丈夫　俺は丸腰だ

translation.en: Tell your men to put their guns down.
[Leo] You gotta move this truck, we gotta get our men out of here.
translation.ja: 車を動かしてくれ 我々は兵士の救助を
どうなってる 大尉は何を

translation.en: [Leo] Master Sergeant. Get your men off the street. Let's get that truck moved.
translation.ja: 特務曹長　負傷兵を救助しろ

translation.en: -Go get those Marines. -What did you say to him?
[Leo] Said we had to get vaccines through.
-Is that all it took? -No, I gave him the aid truck.
translation.ja: それだけ？ 救援車を渡した

translation.en: [scoffs] They had weapons, though. They weren't after food.
translation.ja: 相手は民兵だ 食料が目的じゃない

translation.en: It's our job to identify, neutralize.
It's our job to stay alive long enough to get our intel
translation.ja: 情報の入手が最優先だ

translation.en: and focus on the bigger picture.
-We gotta get to the clinic. -[Miller] Keep your eyes open.
translation.ja: 病院に行くぞ 油断するな

translation.en: Just like that. We all go--

translation.ja: クラズニーだ　９時の方向

translation.en: Try and concentrate fire on the building. Flush them out into the open.
translation.ja: 建物に集中砲撃を 引きずり出せ

translation.en: We gotta make it to our contact!
We're gonna go ahead on foot!
Copy! We'll take care of this shitshow.
translation.ja: 了解　ここは任せろ
ワクチンを運べ 分かった

translation.en: [Harp] That was Koval's men attacking us?
[Leo] Yeah, they hit the supply truck and waited for the locals to go for food.
translation.ja: そうだ 輸送車を襲い 市民に食料を奪わせた

translation.en: Koval's getting closer. Popping up like a game of whack-a-mole.
translation.ja: コバルはまるで モグラ叩きのモグラだ

translation.en: Lose the helmet. Makes you look aggressive. Trying to cultivate trust.
translation.ja: ヘルメットを脱がないと 信用されないぞ

translation.en: Keep your gun in the holster. It might just keep you alive.
translation.ja: 銃は離すな　命綱だからな

translation.en: Miller doesn't know about our real mission?
Eckhart thinks you can manage this conflict from behind a fence.
translation.ja: 基地で解決できると思ってる

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta get dirty to see any real change.
translation.ja: 変化を起こすのは汚れ役だ

translation.en: -He doesn't like you, you know. -[Leo sighs]
-What? Can you feel pain? -Of course I can.
translation.ja: 痛覚も？ なければ共感できない

translation.en: I couldn't empathize with you if I didn't. Like now, what do you feel?
translation.ja: なければ共感できない 今の気分は？

translation.en: [Leo] That's good. That means you're here and alive.
Do you ever wonder why I look like this, Harp?

translation.ja: 顔？　高い頬骨のこと？

translation.en: Why would the Pentagon pick my face to represent the United States Marines?
translation.ja: 米軍海兵隊の象徴が なぜこの顔なのか

translation.en: Why wouldn't they make me a blond-haired, blue-eyed, all-American varsity peckerwood?
translation.ja: 金髪碧眼の白人ではない 理由は何だと思う

translation.en: Didn't wanna ask. Thought it might be robotist.
translation.ja: ロボット差別者のせい？

translation.en: My sleeve might say US, but my face conveys neutrality.
translation.ja: 袖には“ＵＳ” だが俺の顔は中立的で

translation.en: Our contact is waiting for us.
translation.ja: 情報提供者が待ってる
ダムスクの野営地？ そうだ

translation.en: A refugee shelter run by the Resistance.
translation.ja: 市民軍運営の難民収容所だ

translation.en: Shit. I've seen it from the air.
translation.ja: これ 映像で見たぞ

translation.en: Find out what they need and give it to them.
translation.ja: 必要な物を見極め 与えろ

translation.en: If Koval finds the nukes, it's the end of the world as we know it.
translation.ja: コバルが核兵器を見つけたら 世界が終わる

translation.en: [Viktor, in Ukrainian] Do you have the incendiary rounds?
[Viktor, in Ukrainian] Kill him. Kill them both.

translation.ja: くたばれ　アメリカ豚め

translation.en: What do you know about Viktor Koval?
-[man] Give him to us, Americans. -Tell me!
I hit you in your subclavian artery. You're gonna bleed out.
translation.ja: 鎖骨下動脈を撃った 失血死するぞ

translation.en: Or do you wanna spend your final few moments with my friends here?
translation.ja: 最期の瞬間を 俺の仲間と過ごすか？

translation.en: [Leo] He's a fanatic. It always ends the same.
translation.ja: 狂信者の末路は常にひとつだ

translation.en: -You gotta call this in. -Nothing to call in yet.
translation.ja: 本部に報告しないと まだだ

translation.en: What are you talking about? We got insurgents. We got a sniper.
translation.ja: 暴徒に狙撃されたんですよ

translation.en: That's enough to get command to listen, to commit a fucking task force--
translation.ja: 本部に報告して 特殊部隊の派遣を…

translation.en: All we have is enough for command to hold us up in bureaucracy three days
translation.ja: 官僚主義は仕事の邪魔だ 核兵器に話が及ぶまで ３日を要する

translation.en: while they consider if Perimeter's even a conversation.
translation.ja: 核兵器に話が及ぶまで ３日を要する

translation.en: We don't have that kind of time.
If their spies and snipers are here, that means Koval isn't that far behind.
translation.ja: 狙撃者がいるなら コバルも近くにいる

translation.en: You said we'd deliver the vaccines to get intel on Koval. Where the fuck are we going?
translation.ja: ワクチンを届け 情報提供者と会うのでは？

translation.en: I didn't say the intel was at the clinic.
This is a live-fire scenario, son. Think you can handle it?
translation.ja: これが実戦だ　感想は？

translation.en: I'll walk back to base, tell 'em you went rogue.
Stop staring at me like that. Did your motherboard freeze?
translation.ja: だからじっと見てるのか？

translation.en: Why are you such a pain in my motherfucking ass?
translation.ja: お前って奴は ウザいにも程があるな

translation.en: -Who programmed you to curse so much? -Nobody.
translation.ja: 悪態も仕様か？ 相手に合わせて 反応するだけだ

translation.en: I respond to the asshole that's in front of me.
translation.ja: 相手に合わせて 反応するだけだ
とっとと乗れ イヤだ

translation.en: How long do you think you'll survive out here on your own?
translation.ja: 生きて出られるといいな

translation.en: You killed two marines but saved 38.
They should've put a fucking medal on your chest.
You mean you stepped outside your box, and they had to put you back?
translation.ja: 逸脱したから 再訓練させられると？

translation.en: -Is that why you think you're here? -I broke chain of command.
translation.ja: そうか？ 命令を無視した

translation.en: What about you? What's your mandate?
Shit, I'm no expert, but this seems beyond protocol for a r--
translation.ja: 慣例を逸脱してる　大尉が…

translation.en: A hand. Soft tissue and heat--
I was created to simulate one to the exact necessity to do my damn job.
translation.ja: 任務遂行のため 人間を模して造られた

translation.en: But I also have the ability to break the rules in certain circumstances.
translation.ja: だが 状況によっては 規則を破る能力もある

translation.en: In extreme situations, I have the ability to act of my own volition.
translation.ja: 極限状態では 自らの意志で行動する

translation.en: And is this an extreme situation?
Ask me what you really wanna ask.
How come you're so like us?
So, you equate humanity with emotion?
People are stupid, habitual, and lazy.
translation.ja: 人間は愚かで懲りない怠け者
感情に流され過ちを犯す

translation.en: Maybe humans aren't emotional enough, Lieutenant.
Stay close, keep your mouth shut, and pay attention.
translation.ja: 口を閉じて注意力を保て

translation.en: Pleasure to meet you. Lieutenant Harp.
translation.ja: はじめまして ハープ中尉だ

translation.en: So formal. You'll be calling me ma'am next.
translation.ja: 堅苦しい挨拶はやめて

translation.en: I hear you had some trouble in Damsk.
I've done everything you asked me to do, Sofiya.
translation.ja: 君の頼みはすべて聞いた

translation.en: I'm gonna need you to level with me, please.
-She can trust you. Right, Harp? -Uh, yeah.
It was definitely a Krasny spy?
I think Koval's one step away from operating the silos.
translation.ja: コバルが核に近づいてる
コバルが核に近づいてる なぜ分かる

translation.en: The nuclear missiles can only be operated by highly classified access codes.
translation.ja: 核ミサイルの起動には コードが必要なの

translation.en: When the Cold War ended, an FSK agent got hold of those codes and hid them in a vault.
translation.ja: 冷戦後 ある諜報員が コードを金庫に隠した

translation.en: Somewhere this side of the city.
The agent figured the codes would fetch a price.
translation.ja: いつか大金で売るため

translation.en: -And Koval met that price. -I think so.
translation.ja: コバルが買った？ おそらく

translation.en: If he knows where the silos are, and he gets those codes, he'll have access to nukes.
translation.ja: 発射装置の場所を 知っていたら核兵器を撃てる

translation.en: -Tell me where those codes are. -I don't know.
If we did, we'd have gotten to them already.
translation.ja: 知ってたら手に入れてる

translation.en: Well, tell me who might know.
to break into a vault, the Krasny would need to buy hardware here,
translation.ja: 金庫に侵入するには ここで扱う機器が必要だわ

translation.en: as they wouldn't be able to smuggle it or get it through our lines.
translation.ja: ここで扱う機器が必要だわ

translation.en: [Sofiya] There's only one arsehole with access to the weapons they'd need who wouldn't think twice about betraying us.
translation.ja: 兵器を扱う立場で 忠誠心のない男なら知ってる

translation.en: He's an arms dealer called Varyk Oshlak.
translation.ja: 武器商人オシュラックよ

translation.en: If they went to him, he might know where it's located.
Can you take us to him?
You'll need weapons of your own.
Sadly, no discounts for the US.
What? Hold up. You're buying weapons from her?
How do you think I pay for this orphanage?
You know these are illegal weapons, right?
-[Sofiya] You have to do this for us. -I know. I will.
translation.ja: 協力して ああ そのつもりだ

translation.en: It's his first day outside the wire.
translation.ja: 初めて基地の外に出た

translation.en: How does it feel to see your work up close?
translation.ja: 仕事の成果を見た感想は？

translation.en: Yeah. Most of these kids weren't orphaned by the civil war.
translation.ja: 孤児を生んだのは 内戦ではなく

translation.en: [Leo] Hey, guys, we gotta get going. Get in the car.
translation.ja: さあ行くぞ　車に乗れ
奴の車よ　絶対にいる

translation.en: You wanna try that again, or should I fuck you up a little?
translation.ja: 逆らうと痛い目を見るぞ

translation.en: Hey, Sofiya. I haven't seen you for long.
translation.ja: ソフィヤ 久しぶりだな

translation.en: -I can see how much you missed me. -[chuckles]
Stop. I'll tell you whatever you want.
translation.ja: やめろ　何でも話す

translation.en: Did you sell weapons to a Krasny unit this morning?
translation.ja: クラズニーに 武器を売ったか？

translation.en: Ten men. They took delivery one hour ago.
Details, piece of shit. What did you sell them?
-Well, I'm a dead man if-- -Either I kill you or Koval kills you,
translation.ja: 話せない コバルより先に俺が殺すぞ

translation.en: but I'm much closer right now.
translation.ja: コバルより先に俺が殺すぞ
ドニプロ銀行だ パゼレスキ通りよ

translation.en: Guess he won't be needing his car.
[in Ukrainian] I'm going to kill you!
-Fastest way to Passazryski street? -Head north, take Magistral.
translation.ja: 最短ルートは？ 北のマジスタル通り

translation.en: [scoffs] You know the streets by memory?
-Like a fucking cab driver. -Like a fucking drone pilot.
translation.ja: 運転手並みに 操縦士だろ

translation.en: We can't go up against Koval alone. We gotta call in for backup.
translation.ja: 応援を呼んだほうがいい

translation.en: Come on, Harp. What's wrong? You scared? [laughs]
At what point does your program shut down?
translation.ja: 違反行為で強制終了だ

translation.en: -At what point are you violating orders? -That's why you're here.
translation.ja: 違反行為で強制終了だ だから君が必要だ

translation.en: Our intel investigation into the Perimeter is not just cold. It was aborted.
translation.ja: 核装置に関する捜査は 中止になった

translation.en: An intel officer like you can follow an aborted line, and it's considered a hunch. If I do it, it's a fault.
translation.ja: 中止になった捜査を行えば 故障と見なされ強制終了

translation.en: Intel would take me offline, leaving Koval to win.
What about your internal systems? At what point do you cross the line?
When you're no longer with me.
I requested your deployment because I need your help.
translation.ja: だから君を部下に選んだ

translation.en: That means this whole shitty time, I'm the one breaking orders?
translation.ja: 規則違反してるのは 俺ってこと？

translation.en: I'll go to jail! I can't do this shit.
-Tell me to stop the car. -You'll stop?
translation.ja: なら降りろ そんな

translation.en: Tell me to stop the car!
We're the only ones searching for him.
translation.ja: コバルの追跡が 無駄だと思うなら

translation.en: But if you don't think it's worth your time, call it in,
translation.ja: コバルの追跡が 無駄だと思うなら 通報を

translation.en: they'll shut me down, and you can fucking walk!
translation.ja: 俺は強制終了　お前は歩く

translation.en: -Okay, let me… Let me think. -[Leo scoffs]
All I'm saying is, calling in for backup might not be such a bad idea.
translation.ja: 俺が言いたいのは 応援要請が必要ってこと

translation.en: [Leo] Here we go. Keep your eyes open, kid.
There's something I need you to do for me.
The Russians have the capability to detect the signal.
translation.ja: 敵に信号を感知されたくない

translation.en: -They put your tracker on your back? -Cut it out.
translation.ja: 追跡装置？ 除去しろ

translation.en: -Does it hurt? -Of course it fucking hurts.
[Leo] No matter what happens, Koval can't leave with those codes.
translation.ja: 何があってもコードは渡すな

translation.en: -[radio chatter in Russian] -Call Eckhart. Tell him Koval's in the building.
It's okay. I'm here. You're safe now.
The fuck are you doing, Harp?

translation.ja: 報告を　コバルを追う

translation.en: On Passazryski street. Koval's here. He's going after the codes.
translation.ja: パゼレスキ通りです コバルがコードを

translation.en: You're not making any sense. Koval's where?
translation.ja: 筋道を立てて話せ　どこだ

translation.en: [quietly] Of course I don't make any fucking sense.
It's a hostage situation. Krasnys everywhere, and fucking Russian Gumps.
translation.ja: そこら中 クラズニーと メカ兵だらけだ

translation.en: We need to call in the Marines.
Get me eyes on the ground.
[in Russian] Drop your weapons. Or she will die.
translation.ja: 〈銃を捨てろ　女を殺すぞ〉

translation.en: Take it easy, okay? No one else has to get hurt.
translation.ja: 落ち着け　誰も傷つけるな

translation.en: The Marines are coming. I'm sure we can work this out.

translation.ja: 分かった　落ち着け

translation.en: Why don't you let them go, huh?
-[shouts] -Let them go! -[whimpers] -No one else has to get hurt.
translation.ja: 解放しろ　誰も傷つけるな

translation.en: -[in Russian] Come on! -Look, it's all gonna be okay.

translation.ja: そこの人 こっちへ
奧へ行け　その扉だ

translation.en: -[Eckhart] Go for Eckhart. -Gumps are firing on civilians.
translation.ja: エックハート メカ兵が市民に発砲中

translation.en: -No one in command. Where are the Marines? -They're not coming.
translation.ja: 海兵隊は？ 派遣しない

translation.en: What are you still doing there?
We're about to take out Koval. You need to move your ass now.
translation.ja: コバルを排除する　移動しろ

translation.en: [announcement] ETA to target, T-minus two minutes.
Unless you wanna be that cautionary tale, you better move your ass, son.
translation.ja: 悪例になる前に避難しろ

translation.en: There's civilians on the ground, sir, and Leo's still in there.
translation.ja: 民間人がいます　大尉も中だ

translation.en: ETA to target, T-minus one minute.
Hey! You gotta go inside now. Come on!
translation.ja: 建物の中に入ろう ほら

translation.en: We're gonna go in there, okay? Okay. You ready?
translation.ja: 中に入るよ　いいね？

translation.en: I tried to save 'em, you know.
Now you see your work first-hand.
translation.ja: これが君のしたことだ

translation.en: -[Leo] Goddamn, you a cold motherfucker. -I'm aware we kill people, Captain.
translation.ja: 君は血も涙もない 罪悪感はあります

translation.en: [man] I don't wanna die down here!
What the fuck are you up to, Leo? Hmm?
A drone pilot with a history of gross disobedience,
translation.ja: 命令違反をした操縦士が 何を言っても

translation.en: punished and humiliated, and with nobody to believe anything I say
translation.ja: 命令違反をした操縦士が 何を言っても 誰も信じてくれない

translation.en: unless you back it up, so tell me what the fuck am I doing here,
translation.ja: 誰も信じてくれない 俺に何をさせるつもりか 教えてくれ

translation.en: and what are you using me for?
translation.ja: 俺に何をさせるつもりか 教えてくれ

translation.en: Sounds like you don't trust me, Harp.
translation.ja: 俺を信用してないのか
俺の権限で君を選んだ

translation.en: I chose you. I needed someone who could think outside the box.
translation.ja: 俺の権限で君を選んだ 枠から外れた者を

translation.en: Leo, I'm ordering you to return us back to base immediately
translation.ja: リオ大尉 基地に戻るよう命ずる

translation.en: -or be in breach of your moral directives. -[Leo scoffs]
And the fact that I can act of my own volition scares you.
translation.ja: 俺の自発行動が怖いか？

translation.en: No, you need me to validate you.
Oh, come on! Here we go. Who validates you?
translation.ja: じゃあ 君に許可を与えるのは？

translation.en: You follow me, I follow you.
It's kinda like a paradox of command, isn't it?
-I'm ordering you to stop the fucking car. -Or what?
translation.ja: 停車を命ずる 逆らえばどうなる？

translation.en: My backup system allows me to relinquish the need for human authority
translation.ja: 発言者の判断が不適切な場合

translation.en: if said person is exhibiting improper or impaired judgment.
translation.ja: 命令を無視する機能がある

translation.en: have exercised improper, impaired judgment throughout this mission…
translation.ja: 君は不適切な 判断しかしていない

translation.en: [Leo] …including the removal of one fail-safe device.
translation.ja: しかも フェイルセーフ装置を外した

translation.en: A what? You told me that was your tracker.

translation.ja: 軍用装備品を破壊した

translation.en: Thanks to your air strike back there…
Tell him Koval's in the building.
Sometimes you gotta get dirty to see any real change.
translation.ja: 変化を起こすのは汚れ役だ

translation.en: Hey, hey! Don't grow balls now.
You owe me more than this, man.
I just saved your fucking life.
[gasps] Hello? I can't fucking breathe in here!
The boss is coming! Be quiet.
It's truth serum. You'll tell us all we need to know.
-Are you the leader of the Resistance? -Are you our enemy?
translation.ja: 市民軍の首領？ あんたは敵？

translation.en: No. No, I'm not your fucking enemy. I-I don't have any information.
translation.ja: 俺は敵じゃないし 情報も持ってない

translation.en: [laughs] It wasn't pentothal. It was antibiotic for your wounds.
translation.ja: 自白剤は嘘　抗生物質よ

translation.en: Right. Awesome joke. Hilarious, comical, very fucking funny.
translation.ja: 面白い冗談だ　笑えるよ

translation.en: -Not until I know you're no threat. -I'm not a threat. Leo is.
translation.ja: 疑いが晴れたら 大尉を疑え

translation.en: -I think he's going after Perimeter. -No, he's going for Koval.
translation.ja: 目的は核兵器だ 目的はコバルよ
目的はコバルよ 奴は銀行で死んだ

translation.en: -He died in the bank strike. -He wasn't there.
translation.ja: 奴は銀行で死んだ いなかったの

translation.en: Leo's going to take control of the nuclear missiles for the Resistance.
translation.ja: リオは核兵器を押収し 市民軍のために使う

translation.en: I told you I'd get the codes, Viktor.
Why would you try to kill me?
What's stopping me from killing you and taking it?
translation.ja: 殺して奪ってもいいぞ

translation.en: You honestly think I would have them with me, Viktor? I'm not an idiot.
translation.ja: ここへ持ってくるほど 愚かではない

translation.en: -We trust in Leo. -You trust in Leo?
He's more likely to take control of the nukes himself, and he used you.
translation.ja: 核兵器が欲しくて 君を利用した

translation.en: -He told you that? -Not in so many words.
I don't know exactly why he's doing it, but you can't trust him.
translation.ja: 理由は分からない だが信用するな

translation.en: I want the location of Perimeter.
translation.ja: 核装置の場所を教えろ

translation.en: What do I get in return?
I didn't know your kind had such a sense of humor.
It's incredible what man is able to create.
translation.ja: 人間の創造力はすさまじい

translation.en: [Sofiya] I think I know Leo better than you, Lieutenant Harp.
translation.ja: 私のほうがリオに詳しいわ

translation.en: You see, Leo, he can't lie to himself.
translation.ja: 彼は自分に嘘がつけない

translation.en: He can't pretend there's virtue in an immoral act.
translation.ja: 不道徳な行為を美化できない

translation.en: -He's learned who the real enemy is. -The real enemy. Who? The US military?
translation.ja: 真の敵を知った 真の敵？　米軍か？

translation.en: They rationalize this war because it serves their fucking agenda.
translation.ja: この戦争を正当化してる

translation.en: Russia wants its former territories back.
translation.ja: ロシアの目的は領土回復

translation.en: The US wants to destabilize Russia by extending conflict in those countries.
translation.ja: 米国は紛争を拡大させ ロシアを弱体化させたい

translation.en: We are the ones who want fucking peace, Lieutenant Harp.
translation.ja: 平和を望むのは我々だけ

translation.en: And if Leo's rogue operation makes sure you leave us in peace,
translation.ja: リオの離反で平和が戻るなら

translation.en: if your war machine turns against you, well then, why should I fucking care?
translation.ja: あんたが裏切られようと どうでもいい
イカれたテロリストに核だ
ワシントン ニューヨーク…

translation.en: He's gonna launch a nuclear strike on the US.
translation.ja: 米国に核攻撃を仕掛ける？

translation.en: Or not when it's American lives.
It's not collateral. It's mass murder. You can't let him do this.
translation.ja: 大量虐殺だ　やめさせろ

translation.en: What will you do with so much power?
That's between me and my creator.
What would you do with it, Viktor?
-I knew you would say that. -Well, yeah. Can you say the same?
translation.ja: やっぱりな 同じだろ？

translation.en: We can be good allies in the worst to come.
translation.ja: 混乱の世で手を組もう

translation.en: Don't make me have to ruin this marvel of American technology.
translation.ja: 米国の技術の粋は 壊したくない

translation.en: the Terror of the Balkans. My man,
translation.ja: バルカンの恐怖　俺のダチ

translation.en: what makes you think that you're still calling shots?
translation.ja: お前に決定権を 与えると思うか？

translation.en: You should have never tried to kill me.
How many people will die, Sofiya?
[Sofiya] Enough to teach Americans about collateral damage.
translation.ja: 米国人の啓発に十分な数よ
じゃあな ヴィクトル

translation.en: I said, stay where you are!
Sergeant Miller has been briefed on Operation Leo. Go ahead.
translation.ja: リオの正体は曹長に伝えた

translation.en: I appreciate that you had a rough time out there.
Captain Leo was destroyed. We lost his signal immediately.
translation.ja: リオ大尉の信号は途切れた

translation.en: He lost his signal 'cause I removed his fail-safe.
translation.ja: 俺が装置を除去したせいだ

translation.en: I know I fucked up, okay? But, sir, you've gotta listen to me.
translation.ja: 俺はヘマをしたが 話を聞いてほしい

translation.en: Leo has the codes, and he's going after the silos. He's on his way to Koval.
translation.ja: 大尉はコードを持って コバルに接近中だ

translation.en: You said Koval was at the bank.
translation.ja: コバルは銀行で死んだ

translation.en: -He's dead. -Leo tricked me. Koval was never there.
translation.ja: コバルは銀行で死んだ リオの作り話だ

translation.en: Wanted me to call in the drone strike so it would appear he'd been destroyed.
translation.ja: 死を偽装するため 空爆を要請した

translation.en: You could've turned back, he would've been forced to comply.
translation.ja: 君が戻れば済んだことだ

translation.en: Leo's smarter than we are. He's stronger, faster, and he can be very persuasive.
translation.ja: リオは人間より賢く強く 口が達者だ

translation.en: This Viktor Koval Perimeter stuff, it's all bullshit!
translation.ja: 核兵器の話など たわ言だ

translation.en: Anything to it, Intel would've made it priority.

translation.ja: 俺は知ってる 座れ

translation.en: I was eyes on the ground.

translation.ja: 核兵器は存在し リオが狙ってる

translation.en: -And Leo's going after it. -I thought Koval was.
translation.ja: 核兵器は存在し リオが狙ってる コバルでは？

translation.en: Leo's playing the Krasnys and the Resistance against each other.
translation.ja: リオはクラズニーと 市民軍を争わせた

translation.en: They all have the same goal. Nuke the US mainland.
translation.ja: 両者の狙いは米国への核攻撃

translation.en: He can! He put a gun to my head and said something about a paradox of command.
translation.ja: 可能だ 命令の逆説ってやつらしい

translation.en: Me using my judgment triggered his fail-safe directive
to relinquish his need to follow human authority.
translation.ja: 人間に従う機能を無効にした

translation.en: -How do you know he's gonna meet Koval? -It's a long fucking story.
translation.ja: なぜ分かった 話せば長くなる

translation.en: Sir, we don't have time for this, okay?
translation.ja: 話せば長くなる リオの発見が先だ
リオの発見が先だ 無理だ　追跡不可能だろ

translation.en: Hmm? You made that practically impossible, Lieutenant.
translation.ja: 無理だ　追跡不可能だろ

translation.en: Arms dealer. We've been tracking him for months.
translation.ja: 追跡対象の武器商人だ

translation.en: It'll take us hours to go through Central.

translation.ja: ハープ？ 助けてくれ
何？ 説明の時間がない

translation.en: Okay. Do we have any surveillance drones out in the Snovski District along the Russian border?
translation.ja: スノブスキ地方に 偵察機は飛んでる？

translation.en: -Got a Global Hawk Asset in the area. -Okay. I need information
translation.ja: グローバルホークが航行中 黒のエスカレードを探せ
黒のエスカレードを探せ 登録番号1209 東へ向かってる
登録番号1209 東へ向かってる 了解

translation.en: Is this what you're looking for?
Yes, that's him. Okay, okay. Stay on him.
translation.ja: そうだ　追い続けてくれ

translation.en: [Eckhart] He's in disputed territory on the Russian border.
translation.ja: 国境近くの紛争地に入った

translation.en: I can't send forces over unverified intel. I will start a war with the Russians.
translation.ja: 不確かな情報で軍を送れば 戦争になる

translation.en: -Once I find him, I'll call it in. -And then what?
translation.ja: その時は応援を それから？

translation.en: Can we drone strike the silos without detonating the warheads?
translation.ja: 核が爆発しないような攻撃を

translation.en: It'll take out the command center and disarm the missiles.
translation.ja: 司令室だけ爆破しよう

translation.en: What if you don't get to him?
Then deny we had this conversation and pray I'm wrong about his plans.
translation.ja: 俺の話が間違いだと 願うしかない

translation.en: Let me do the right thing.
Incendiary rounds. Designed to go through armored vehicles.
translation.ja: 焼夷弾だ　装甲車を貫通する

translation.en: -[Harp] Those are gonna hurt. -Might up your chances against Leo.
translation.ja: リオにも 勝ち目が出てくるぞ

translation.en: GPS is connected to the Global Hawk.
You should be good to go.

translation.ja: 曹長 協力に感謝するよ

translation.en: -I hope I never see you again after this. -Yeah. I'll try not to disappoint you.
translation.ja: もう会いたくないね 失望させないよう頑張る

translation.en: [Bale] Harp, we've lost visuals of target.
translation.ja: 見失ったわ 〝信号消失〞 見失ったわ

translation.en: [Harp] Copy that. So where the fuck am I going?
translation.ja: 了解　道案内を頼む

translation.en: You're right at the Russian border. Be careful.
translation.ja: ロシアの国境よ　用心して
ハープ 我々の標的は 自軍の諜報員だけだ

translation.en: that we are taking out our operative, and our operative only. Do you copy?
translation.ja: 我々の標的は 自軍の諜報員だけだ 確認を

translation.en: [man] Give me a second. Patching through.
Harp, according to your tracker, you're in the Dastriz Complex.
translation.ja: 君がいるのは ダストリズ･コンビナートだ

translation.en: Been fucking flying over that place for years.
Do you have visual on Captain Leo
Drone is in position. Your confirmation brings the rain.
translation.ja: 確認次第 攻撃を始める

translation.en: What the fuck are you doing here, rookie?
The war is fucking bullshit, but setting off those nukes
translation.ja: 核兵器を使っても 何も解決しない

translation.en: -won't solve anything! -Says the man that killed two to save 38.
translation.ja: 核兵器を使っても 何も解決しない やむを得ない犠牲だ

translation.en: -And you'll kill a million. -And I'll save a hundred million.
[man] We're picking up significant heat readings.
translation.ja: 異常な温度上昇を検知

translation.en: I see it, Bale. Stand by.
-[machine whirs] -Harp, drone is in position to strike.
Harp, I repeat. Drone in position to strike.
translation.ja: 繰り返す　準備はできた

translation.en: Okay. Designed to go through armored vehicles.
translation.ja: 装甲車も貫通する弾だ

translation.en: Okay. How do you switch it off?
How the fuck do you switch it off?
Go home to Olivia Rose Meyer.
How the fuck do you switch it off?
Harp, this is Eckhart. Can you confirm eyes on Leo? Over.
-Why the fuck are you doing this, Leo? -[Eckhart] Harp, do you copy?
translation.ja: なぜこんなことを 聞こえるか？

translation.en: Remove the humanity, increase the fight.
translation.ja: 人間を排除すると 争いが激化する

translation.en: [breathes heavily] The world's first use of a fully autonomous cyborg backfires.
translation.ja: 世界で初めての 自律サイボーグ採用は 裏目に出る

translation.en: What are you saying you want? You want them to shut the program down?
translation.ja: メカ兵のプログラムを 終了させたいと？

translation.en: No, no, it's never that simple with you, Leo.
translation.ja: そんな単純な話じゃないだろ

translation.en: You've been lying this whole time, why the fuck would I believe you anyway?
translation.ja: いつも嘘ばかりで 信用できるか

translation.en: Believe what you want, but this…
translation.ja: 勝手にしろ　だがこれは…

translation.en: I have to destroy the monster.
translation.ja: モンスターを破壊しないと

translation.en: They need to understand that these wars must end,
translation.ja: 戦争は終結させなければ ならない

translation.en: and I am the face of never-ending war.
translation.ja: 俺は終わりのない戦いの象徴

translation.en: How about we do it my way?
You just tell us when to hit that red button, Harp.
Jesus Christ! Better move your ass.
You, of all people, should understand that.
translation.ja: 君なら理解できるはずだ

translation.en: The missiles have range to the US.
The drone strike is imminent. Clear out of there, Alpha Three.
translation.ja: 攻撃準備はできた 早く避難しろ

translation.en: Humans can learn to do better.
That is the greater good, Leo.

translation.ja: ハープ 聞こえるか？

translation.en: I need you to move your ass now.
Please, don't be in there, Harp.
-[woman] Good job, everybody! Well done. -[man] All right!
Harp, this is Eckhart. Do you copy?
translation.ja: ハープ 聞こえるか？

translation.en: Harp, you should be proud, son.
I already spoke to your captain, Brydon.
